name: Raoul Pal The Journey Man
title: You Need Cash But Can't Sell Bitcoin? Watch This
text:
Synopsis
A new crypto lending platform enables users to use Bitcoin as collateral for cash loans without selling their assets, creating a global, asset-based lending model that democratizes access to credit by evaluating the asset's value rather than the individual borrower's traditional credit profile.

Key Insights
- The lending platform allows Bitcoin holders to obtain cash loans while keeping their cryptocurrency as collateral
- The lending model is designed to be global, enabling users from different countries to access credit using Bitcoin
- The key innovation is assessing credit quality based on the asset (Bitcoin) rather than the individual borrower
- The platform provides transparency and visibility for users throughout the lending process
- The lending solution addresses the problem of needing fiat currency without wanting to sell Bitcoin
- The model treats Bitcoin as a standardized, globally recognizable asset for credit purposes
